For sale is a rare vintage Seiko SilverWave diver’s watch, model 2621-0050, made in Japan for the Japan Domestic Market (JDM). Based on the serial number 941700, this watch dates to April 1979.


This distinctive mini diver features a bold orange dial, paired with a bi-color black and orange rotating bezel, and comes on its original Seiko stainless steel bracelet. A compact and sporty quartz diver, the SilverWave line was Seiko’s innovative response to early waterproof sports watches, and this version remains highly sought after today.


The watch is being sold for parts or repair as it is currently not functioning and is completely untested, so it is unknown what the issue is or if the watch can be repaired.


Key Features:

• Year: April 1979

• Country of Manufacture: Japan

• Dial: Bright orange with white and black chapter ring

• Bezel: Rotating bi-color diver bezel (black/orange)

• Bracelet: Original Seiko stainless steel

• Condition: Near mint physical condition with minimal signs of wear – see photos for exact details

• Water Resistance: Factory rated

• Size: Compact “mini diver” profile ideal for vintage collectors


This is a very rare and highly collectible JDM Seiko diver, especially in this vibrant colorway and original configuration. Not often seen outside of Japan.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Waltham Art Deco Fancy Enamel Dial Men’s 15J Manual Gold Cushion Watch

itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a stunning vintage Waltham men’s wristwatch, featuring a beautifully ornate Art Deco enamel dial housed in a gold-filled cushion case. This timepiece is a striking example of early American wristwatch design, complete with a scalloped white enamel dial adorned with vivid blue numerals and intricate gold crescent markers. The elegant blued hands and subsidiary seconds dial at 6 o’clock further emphasize its refined 1920s character.

Powering this watch is a 15-jewel manual wind movement, signed American Waltham Watch Co., with the movement serial number 9251342 dating it to circa 1900–1901. The movement is running smoothly and holding accurate time.

The case, made by B.W.C. Co. (Brooklyn Watch Case Co.), is part of their Monarch line, and is crafted from gold-filled metal with fixed wire lugs and a signed case back. The case measures approximately 32mm (excluding the crown) and is marked with reference number 109527. The watch is fitted with a brand new high-end black leather strap, ready for daily wear or display.

Key Features:
• Brand: Waltham
• Style: Art Deco
• Dial: Fancy white enamel with blue numerals and gold crescents
• Case Shape: Cushion
• Case Size: 32mm (excluding crown)
• Case Material: Gold-filled
• Case Maker: B.W.C. Co. (Brooklyn Watch Case Co.)
• Case Reference #: 109527
• Movement: 15-jewel manual wind
• Movement Serial #: 9251342 (circa 1900–1901)
• Strap: Brand new black leather strap
• Condition: Running and holding accurate time; fantastic overall condition — see photos for full details

This rare early wristwatch is a fantastic example of Waltham’s craftsmanship and pre-Depression era design. Ideal for collectors or those looking to wear a truly unique piece of American horological history.

The cushion-shaped case measures 31mm (excluding crown) and features intricate floral engravings along the gold-plated bezel and lugs. The front of the case is 14K yellow gold plated, while the caseback is made from stainless steel and is marked “Sutton – Base Metal – Stainless – U.S.A.”

The dial is highlighted by its decorative gold-tone accents, sub-seconds register at 6 o’clock, ornate Art Deco numerals, and blued steel hands—an eye-catching combination of vintage style and craftsmanship.

The watch comes fitted on a brand new high-end brown leather strap that complements its vintage aesthetic perfectly.

Key Features:
• Brand: Elgin National Watch Co.
• Movement: 7-Jewel Manual Wind (Grade 384)
• Serial: 9296686 (Circa 1901)
• Case Size: 31mm (excluding crown)
• Case Material: 14K Gold Plated Front, Stainless Steel Back
• Dial: Fancy Enamel with Sub-Seconds Register
• Strap: Brand New High-End Brown Leather
• Condition: Excellent for its age; running and keeping accurate time. Photos best represent its physical condition.

A refined addition to any collection and a testament to American horological heritage. Don’t miss out on this rare Art Deco-era piece!

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Military AM Radio LCD Digital Men’s Gadget Watch Compass Strap - NOS
itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a rare and nostalgic Vintage Military Radio Watch, a novelty multi-function LCD digital wristwatch feat...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a rare and nostalgic Vintage Military Radio Watch, a novelty multi-function LCD digital wristwatch featuring a built-in AM radio tuner. This unique piece is still sealed in its original blister packaging, complete with the original wired earphone, and is a perfect collectible for fans of vintage tech and military-themed gadgets.

Key Features:
• AM Radio Tuner (530–1600 KHz) with tuning knob integrated into the strap
• Five-Function LCD Quartz Watch (time, date, seconds, etc.)
• Camouflage Design with faux compass-style dial (non-functional)
• Includes Wired Earphone (still sealed in blister pack)
• Original novelty packaging with military artwork
• Made in China, likely from the late 1980s to early 1990s

Functionality & Condition:
• The original battery has been replaced, and the watch is fully functional
• Timekeeping and LCD display are working as they should
• The AM radio feature is untested as the package remains sealed, but all original accessories are present
• Packaging is in overall good vintage condition with some minor edge wear and shelf marks (see photos)

Please note that while this was marketed as a “military” radio watch, it was not an official military-issued item—it was a novelty item popular during the Cold War era for its fun and tactical look.

This is a fantastic retro tech collectible, ideal for display or wear, and a fun reminder of the gadget-loving culture of the past.

Radio functionality has not been tested.

Ships carefully packaged. Feel free to reach out with any questions.

For sale is a charming vintage Elgin men’s wristwatch, featuring a beautifully ornate Art Deco enamel dial housed in a cushion-shaped nickel case. This timepiece showcases the elegant styling of late 1920s American wristwatch design, highlighted by a white enamel dial with black numerals and intricate gold flourishes that mark each hour. The blued steel hands and subsidiary seconds dial at 6 o’clock further enhance its refined period appeal.

The case, made by Star Watch Case Co., is crafted from nickel and features fixed wire lugs with a rounded cushion profile. The case back is marked with reference number 8476894 and is sized at approximately 32mm (3/0 size) excluding the crown. The watch is fitted with a brand new high-end brown leather strap, making it ready for daily wear or thoughtful display.

• Case Shape: Cushion
• Case Size: 32mm (excluding crown)
• Case Material: Nickel
• Case Maker: Star Watch Case Co.
• Case Reference #: 8476894
• Movement: 7-jewel manual wind
• Movement Serial #: 31580958 (circa 1928)
• Strap: Brand new brown leather strap
• Condition: Running and holding accurate time; very good overall condition — see photos for full details

This lovely vintage Elgin is a wonderful representation of American Art Deco design and craftsmanship. Ideal for collectors of early wristwatches or anyone looking to wear a distinctive piece of 1920s horological history.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Rolwatco 9k Two Tone Gold Art Deco Cocktail Watch - Serviced
itemSummaries.shortDescription: Up for sale is a stunning and rare Vintage Rolex Rolwatco Art Deco Cocktail Watch, housed in a beautifully crafted 9-carat solid gold case and mounted on its original two-tone yellow and white gold me...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Up for sale is a stunning and rare Vintage Rolex Rolwatco Art Deco Cocktail Watch, housed in a beautifully crafted 9-carat solid gold case and mounted on its original two-tone yellow and white gold mesh bracelet. This elegant piece measures approximately 26mm in diameter (excluding the crown) and represents the refined styling and technical quality of 1920s–1930s Swiss watchmaking.


The watch is fully functional, having been recently serviced, and is currently running perfectly and holding accurate time.


The inside of the caseback is stamped ROLWATCO, RWC LTD, and bears Swiss hallmarks along with gold purity marks (.375 for 9k gold). The movement is clean and precise, with beautiful finishing consistent with early Rolex workmanship.


About Rolwatco and Rolex:

Rolwatco stands for Rolex Watch Company and was a trademark used by Rolex in the early 20th century, primarily for watches sold in the Canadian and British Commonwealth markets. Watches marked “Rolwatco” were often produced under the supervision of Wilsdorf & Davis, the original founders of Rolex. These pieces were held to the same high manufacturing standards and are now sought after for their historical significance and scarcity.


Key Features:

• Brand: Rolex / Rolwatco

• Model: Art Deco Cocktail Watch

• Case Size: 26mm (excluding crown)

• Case Material: Solid 9k Gold (.375 hallmark)

• Bracelet: Original two-tone (yellow & white gold) mesh bracelet with ornate clasp (marked “PREMO”)

• Dial: Textured silver-tone with black Arabic numerals

• Movement: Swiss-made, recently serviced, running and accurate

• Condition: Excellent physical condition; see photos

• Caseback Markings: ROLWATCO, RWC LTD, SWISS MADE, 9ct hallmarks, Serial number


This is a highly collectible piece of Rolex’s early international history, ideal for vintage watch enthusiasts, Art Deco collectors, or anyone seeking a timeless and functional accessory.


Ships carefully and fully insured.

Feel free to message me with questions or for additional photos.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Elgin Art Deco Fancy Enamel Dial 7J Men’s Manual Watch - Serviced

The dial features elegant Roman numerals in a deep black tone set against a creamy white enamel base, framed by intricate gold detailing. Ornate Louis XV-style hands complete the watch’s refined, period-authentic character. The subsidiary seconds dial at 6 o’clock adds both utility and visual balance.

The case is a handsome cushion-style design with a 10k rolled gold front and a stainless steel back, manufactured by Elite Watch Case Co. This type of case requires the removal of the crown and stem in order to open it and access the movement — a correct and intentional design choice from this era. Please note: the movement is shown outside of the case in the photos strictly to document this internal detail. The watch is not broken or damaged in any way — it functions perfectly as designed.

The watch measures approximately 30mm across (excluding crown) and is fitted with a brand new high-end black leather strap, making it ready for immediate wear or elegant display.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Rolwatco 9k Art Deco Telephone Dial Cocktail Watch - Running
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This beautiful antique Rolex cocktail watch is a timeless classic, ideal for watch collectors and vintage enthusiasts alike. With a distinctive design and refined craftsmanship, this piece exudes vint...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This beautiful antique Rolex cocktail watch is a timeless classic, ideal for watch collectors and vintage enthusiasts alike. With a distinctive design and refined craftsmanship, this piece exudes vintage charm and sophistication.


In the early 20th century, “Rolwatco”—an abbreviation for Rolex Watch Company—was used as a registered trademark and import/export name associated with Rolex. This name often appeared on watches imported into specific markets, particularly the British Commonwealth, during a period when Rolex was expanding its international presence. While not a separate brand, Rolwatco pieces are fully authentic Rolex-manufactured watches, sometimes bearing unique hallmarks, dial styles, or case designs intended for regional markets. Today, these watches are valued by collectors for their rarity and their role in the early history of Rolex’s global growth.



Key Features:


• Brand: Rolex

• Case Size: 26mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 9ct Yellow Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Original telephone dial

• Era: 1920s-1930s

• Caseback: Marked with Rolex insignia and reference number

This timepiece was a Japan Domestic Market (JDM) exclusive collaboration between Seiko and Playboy, and is one of the most desirable and hard-to-find pieces in the vintage collaboration watch world.

This example is completely original, including the factory black leather strap and extremely rare Playboy-signed gold-tone buckle—details that significantly enhance its collectability and authenticity.


The watch is in full working condition, running smoothly and keeping accurate time. Cosmetically, it is in great physical condition for its age, with only light signs of wear. Please review the photos carefully as they best describe the watch’s overall condition.

itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a remarkable piece of horological history: a genuine sterling silver Rolco by Rolex watch. This timepiece is running smoothly, holding accurate time, and features a 26mm case size, making ...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a remarkable piece of horological history: a genuine sterling silver Rolco by Rolex watch. This timepiece is running smoothly, holding accurate time, and features a 26mm case size, making it a perfect addition for collectors and vintage watch enthusiasts.



About Rolco and Its Rolex Connection:


Rolco was one of several sub-brands created by Rolex during the early 20th century as part of a strategy to offer high-quality timepieces under different brand names for various markets. The name “Rolco” itself is derived from “Rolex Company,” and these watches were typically assembled using Rolex movements or components but sold at a lower price point than their flagship models. These timepieces were often marketed in regions such as the UK and Commonwealth countries.



Key Features:


• Model: Rolco by Rolex

• Movement: Original Swiss movement (15 jewels, signed)

• Case Size: 26mm (sterling silver)

• Condition: The watch is running and keeping accurate time

• Dial: Original patinated dial with Roman numerals and elegant blued steel hands

• Bracelet: Vintage bonklip bracelet



Feel free to reach out with any questions or for additional photos.


Please Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

There are visible signs of use throughout, including on the case and bracelet, but the photos provide the most accurate representation of the watch’s physical condition.

For sale is a beautifully preserved vintage Elgin men’s wristwatch featuring an elegant Art Deco design and a stunning two-tone enamel dial. This manual wind timepiece is powered by a 7-jewel Elgin movement (serial 13998886), and it is currently running and holding accurate time, having recently been serviced.

The cushion-shaped case measures 32mm (excluding the crown) and showcases intricate floral engravings along the bezel and case sides, adding a refined decorative touch to this classic piece. The inside of the case back is marked “Emperor Quality” along with the reference number 1286525.

The dial features a creamy white background with a striking sky blue center section, giving the watch a vibrant and unique two-tone aesthetic. It’s accented by gold-tone hour markers, Roman numerals, a sub-seconds register at 6 o’clock, and elegant blued steel hands. The combination of tones and details creates a dial that’s both sophisticated and full of vintage character.

It comes fitted on a brand new high-end brown perforated leather strap that complements the watch’s warm tones and vintage style.

Key Features:
• Brand: Elgin National Watch Co.
• Movement: 7-Jewel Manual Wind (Serial 13998886)
• Case Size: 32mm (excluding crown)
• Case Shape: Engraved Cushion
• Case Back Inscription: Emperor Quality – 1286525
• Dial: Fancy Creamy White and Blue Enamel with Sub-Seconds Register and Roman Numerals
• Strap: Brand New High-End Brown Leather (Perforated Racing Style)
• Condition: Excellent for its age; running and keeping accurate time. Photos best describe its physical condition.

A refined and rare vintage timepiece that showcases the best of American Art Deco design and Elgin’s storied watchmaking history. A standout addition to any collection.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Dunklings Telephone Dial 9ct Gold Engraved Cocktail Watch With Box
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This vintage Rolex Dunklings telephone dial wristwatch is a classic example of early 20th-century craftsmanship. Made from 9ct solid gold, it features a distinctive 26mm case and an elegant telephone-...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This vintage Rolex Dunklings telephone dial wristwatch is a classic example of early 20th-century craftsmanship. Made from 9ct solid gold, it features a distinctive 26mm case and an elegant telephone-style numeral dial. The watch is running well and holding accurate time, making it a functional piece of history. Additionally, the case back is ornately engraved with a detailed floral pattern, adding a unique aesthetic touch to its already charming character.


The watch includes its original fitted box and original 9ct solid gold mesh bracelet, marked “9CT GOLD.” The bracelet has been carefully preserved but has been replaced for daily wear with a brand new high-end Hirsch Robert leather strap in burgundy with gold hardware, offering both sophistication and comfort.



About Dunklings:


Dunklings was a well-established jeweler in Australia, known for selling high-quality timepieces from brands such as Rolex. In the early 20th century, Rolex partnered with select retailers, including Dunklings, to offer exclusive models tailored to regional markets. These watches often featured unique designs that set them apart from standard Rolex models, making them an intriguing part of Rolex’s history and appealing to collectors.



Key Features:

• Brand: Rolex (Dunklings Collaboration, Australia)

• Case Size: 26mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 9ct Solid Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Fully running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Telephone-style Arabic numeral dial with blued steel hands

• Case Shape: Unique angular design with hinged case back

• Strap: Brand new Hirsch Robert leather strap in burgundy and gold

• Extras: Original 9ct gold mesh bracelet (marked “9CT GOLD”) included

• Case Back: Beautifully engraved with floral motif

• Inner Caseback: Stamped with Rolex insignia, “7 World’s Records,” “Gold Medal,” “Geneva – Suisse,” and case number 384



Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

The Bulova Miss America was one of the most elegant and sought-after ladies’ watches of the 1920s. First introduced during the height of the Art Deco era, this timepiece was renowned for its distinctive design, fine craftsmanship, and vibrant enamel detailing. This Swiss-made timepiece features a rugged, tactical design complete with an integrated analog compass, a rotating bezel, and a highly legible dial with luminous hands and indices. The quartz movement is reliable and currently running with a brand-new battery, keeping accurate time.

Marketed in the U.S. through the Atlantic Eastern Corporation, Texswiss watches gained popularity for their reliability, affordability, and rugged aesthetics—especially models like this compass-equipped sport watch that catered to adventurers, outdoor enthusiasts, and tactical users.

For sale is a vintage Seiko Ski Thermo S821-6000 digital watch, a rare and highly collectible model designed for outdoor and winter sports enthusiasts. Produced circa 1990 to 1992, this Ski Thermo is part of Seiko’s early ’90s lineup of rugged adventure watches. This example is in new without tags condition and is fully functional—every feature works exactly as it should.

The watch is in near flawless physical condition, with no noticeable scratches, scuffs, or significant signs of wear. Please refer to the detailed photos provided for the best representation of its cosmetic condition.

One of the standout features of the Seiko Ski Thermo is its rotating bezel, which allows you to easily switch between different modes, including Time, Alarm, Thermometer, Chronograph Graph, and Time Difference. The bezel rotates smoothly and clicks firmly into place at each setting, making the watch intuitive and highly practical for active use, even with gloves.

This Ski Thermo comes on its original Seiko ski-themed fabric strap, which is also in outstanding condition, showing virtually no fraying or wear—a rarity for these models. The bright yellow accents on the strap and buttons retain their vibrant color, enhancing the overall sporty and retro aesthetic.

Key Features:
• Model: Seiko Ski Thermo S821-6000
• Production Era: Circa 1990–1992
• Module: S821
• Functions: Time, Alarm, Chronograph/Graph, Temperature Sensor (Thermo), Time Difference
• Rotating Bezel for Easy Mode Selection
• Water Resistance: 10 BAR (100 meters)
• Original Seiko Ski Fabric Strap – Near Mint Condition
• Stainless Steel Back
• Vibrant Yellow and Blue Color Scheme

This Seiko Ski Thermo is extremely hard to find, especially in this exceptional condition with the original strap intact. It’s a must-have for serious Seiko collectors, vintage sports watch enthusiasts, or anyone looking for a standout piece with retro tech features.

Don’t miss the opportunity to add this rare Seiko to your collection!

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Elgin Art Deco Fancy Enamel Dial 7J Men’s Manual Cushion Case Watch
itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a charming vintage Elgin men’s wristwatch, featuring a beautifully ornate Art Deco enamel dial housed&n...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a charming vintage Elgin men’s wristwatch, featuring a beautifully ornate Art Deco enamel dial housed in a cushion-shaped nickel case. This timepiece showcases the elegant styling of late 1920s American wristwatch design, highlighted by a cream-and-white enamel dial with bold black numerals and intricate gold detailing encircling each hour. The ornate Louis XV-style hands and subsidiary seconds dial at 6 o’clock further enhance its refined period character.

Powering this watch is a 7-jewel manual wind movement signed Elgin U.S.A., with a movement serial number 15565730 dating it to approximately 1910. The movement is running smoothly and holding accurate time.

The case, made by Scepter, is crafted from nickel and features a classic rounded cushion profile with fixed wire lugs. The inside case back is marked with serial number 7034516. The case measures approximately 32mm (excluding crown), offering a comfortable and elegant fit on the wrist. The watch is fitted with a brand new high-end gray leather strap, complementing the dial and enhancing its ready-to-wear appeal.

Key Features:
• Brand: Elgin
• Style: Art Deco
• Dial: Cream and white enamel with black numerals and gold detailing
• Hands: Louis XV-style ornate hands
• Case Shape: Cushion
• Case Size: 32mm (excluding crown)
• Case Material: Nickel
• Case Maker: Scepter
• Case Serial #: 7034516
• Movement: 7-jewel manual wind
• Movement Serial #: 15565730 (circa 1910)
• Strap: Brand new high-end gray leather strap
• Condition: Fully functional, running, and holding accurate time; excellent overall condition — see photos for the best representation

This elegant vintage Elgin is a wonderful example of early American wristwatch craftsmanship and a beautiful addition to any Art Deco or antique watch collection.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Rolco 9ct Gold Fancy Dial Art Deco Cocktail Watch
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold cocktail watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 26mm case and o...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold cocktail watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 26mm case and original two tone dial this piece exudes unmatched classic elegance.


Rolco was a brand created by Hans Wilsdorf, the founder of Rolex, in the early 20th century as part of his strategy to expand the company’s reach and market. While Rolex focused on premium timepieces, Rolco was used for more affordable, less prestigious watches, often catering to different demographics. Some Rolco watches shared components with Rolex, including movements and cases, though they were typically of a simpler design. The brand eventually faded as Rolex solidified its reputation for luxury and phased out secondary labels.


Key Features:


• Brand: Rolco (Rolex)

• Case Size: 26mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 9ct Solid Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Fully running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Original two tone dial with bold Arabic numerals

• Bracelet: Original rolled gold bracelet

• Era: Circa 1920s/1930s

• Caseback: Marked with Rolex insignia, 9ct hallmark, and reference number 75136



Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

For sale is an incredibly rare vintage Casio M-301 Melody 30 digital watch, featuring Module 472, produced in the early 1980s—estimated around 1982–1983. This was one of Casio’s most feature-rich musical watches of the time, capable of playing 30 built-in melodies across multiple genres including Classic, Latin, Folk, and Pop.

The Cartier Ellipse 78091 is a coveted collector’s item, celebrated for its unique case shape and rarity in today’s market. Whether you’re a Cartier aficionado or a lover of vintage luxury watches, this piece is a true gem that embodies timeless elegance.

The enamel dial features elegant black Roman numerals, blued steel hands, and a red “XII” at the top—a charming signature detail from the era. The case is in fantastic physical condition, with a clean profile and no major dents or damage. The original Rolex-signed movement is intact, but the watch is currently not running and is therefore being sold as-is, for parts or repair.


Key Details:

• Brand: Rolex

• Case Material: Sterling Silver (.925)

• Case Size: 30mm (excluding crown)

• Dial: Enamel with Roman numerals and red XII

• Movement: Manual wind (not running)

• Condition: Excellent physical condition; not functioning

• Hallmarks: W&D, Rolex, 925, Swiss, Serial number inside caseback


Whether you are a collector, restorer, or Rolex historian, this timepiece offers a rare opportunity to own a piece of the brand’s early legacy.

This unique retro timepiece features Alba’s signature rectangular design and a multifunction display with weekday indicator, stopwatch, and alarm capabilities. It carries the distinctive “X-3” badge across the front panel.

It is mounted on a black metal bracelet, which may be original and refinished at some point, or possibly aftermarket. The watch has visible signs of wear throughout, including case scuffing and bracelet surface wear. Please refer to the photos for the best representation of its cosmetic condition.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Casio DW-3100 Digi Graph Lap Split Memory 30 Men’s Digital Watch Mod 828
itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a vintage Casio DW-3100 Digi-Graph Lap/Split Memory 30 men’s digital chronograph wristwatch, featuring the&n...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a vintage Casio DW-3100 Digi-Graph Lap/Split Memory 30 men’s digital chronograph wristwatch, featuring the rare and sought-after Module 828. This exceptional model was produced exclusively for the Japanese Domestic Market (JDM) and is extremely rare to find, especially in fully working condition like this example.

The DW-3100 was part of Casio’s advanced Digi-Graph series in the late 1980s, designed for athletes and sports enthusiasts. It features a high-capacity lap/split memory capable of recording 30 lap times, a unique innovation at the time. The bold display combines a traditional digital readout with three analog-style graphical subdials for tracking time, laps, and splits. The watch also boasts a 20 BAR (200 meters) water resistance rating, making it rugged enough for swimming and active use.

All functions of this watch are fully operational—including timekeeping, chronograph (stopwatch with lap/split timing), alarms, hourly chime, and the backlight. The watch runs strong and is ready to wear or collect.

The watch is in great physical condition, with minor signs of wear consistent with age. Please review the provided photos carefully, as they best represent the physical condition of the watch. It features its original stainless steel case and screw-down case back, both marked with the model number (DW-3100) and module number (828).

Please note: The original band has been replaced with a high-quality rubber/resin strap that complements the sporty design perfectly. The replacement strap is new and durable, ideal for everyday use.

Key Features:
• Model: Casio DW-3100 Digi-Graph “Lap/Split Memory 30”
• Module: 828
• Exclusive JDM (Japan Domestic Market) release – extremely rare outside Japan
• Full stainless steel screw-back case
• Water Resistance: 20BAR / 200 meters
• Advanced Chronograph with 1/100-second stopwatch
• 30-lap split memory storage with best/worst lap recall
• Daily alarm, hourly chime
• 12/24-hour time formats
• Original Digi-Graph LCD display with three analog-style subdials
• Electroluminescent backlight
• New high-quality replacement rubber/resin strap
• Made in Japan

This is a fantastic opportunity to own a genuinely rare vintage Casio sports chronograph from their golden era. The DW-3100 remains highly sought-after among collectors due to its exclusivity, technical innovations, and striking retro design. Don’t miss out—these watches seldom appear in this condition!

Please feel free to reach out with any questions.

itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a Cartier Pre-Must Stepped Tank Watch, a highly collectible piece showcasing Cartier’s iconic design from the mid-20th century. This elegant timepiece, with its stepped case and rich blue ...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a Cartier Pre-Must Stepped Tank Watch, a highly collectible piece showcasing Cartier’s iconic design from the mid-20th century. This elegant timepiece, with its stepped case and rich blue dial, represents the timeless sophistication and craftsmanship for which Cartier is celebrated. This watch is running and keeping accurate time, making it both functional and stylish for daily wear or as a collector’s item.


A Brief History of the Cartier Stepped Tank:


The Cartier Tank, first introduced in 1917, has evolved into one of the most recognizable watch designs in history. The Stepped Tank, a less commonly seen variation, incorporates layered detailing on the case for an added touch of refinement. This Pre-Must model predates the “Must de Cartier” line, offering a more exclusive appeal with vintage charm. Its design bridges the gap between early 20th-century elegance and modern aesthetics.


Key Features:

• Model: Cartier Pre-Must Stepped Tank

• Case Size: 27mm

• Case Material: 18k Gold Electroplated

• Dial: Original deep blue with Roman numeral hour markers

• Movement: Manual wind, running accurately

• Crown: Original Cartier with blue cabochon detail

• Strap: Aftermarket blue leather strap (non-Cartier, complements the dial perfectly)

• Condition: All original watch components; recently tested and holding accurate time



Feel free to reach out with any questions or to request additional photos.

itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Offered here is a rare and highly collectible vintage Casio BP-1B digital blood pressure monitor wristwatch, equipped with module 2187. Released in 2001, this was one of Casio’s most advanced health-focused watches, made exclusively for the Japanese domestic market (JDM).


Unlike earlier BP models like the BP-100 (1992), the BP-1B featured enhanced health monitoring and was designed to interface via infrared (IR) with a companion calibration base unit — a unique innovation that allowed the transfer of calibration data directly to the watch, ensuring highly accurate blood pressure readings. This functionality sets it apart as one of Casio’s most ambitious and forward-thinking digital watches of its era.


Key Features:

• Model: Casio BP-1B

• Module: 2187

• Year of Release: 2001

• Functionality: Fully functional; all features including the blood pressure sensor, backlight, and sound are working perfectly

• Display: Clear digital readout with day, date, and time

• Strap: Aftermarket

• Condition: Good physical condition with light signs of use; please refer to photos for the most accurate representation

• Backlight & Sound: Fully operational

• Origin: Made in Japan – JDM-only release

• Collectibility: Rare and desirable for Casio and tech watch collectors

itemSummaries.shortDescription: This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold men’s watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 32mm unique shaped...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold men’s watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 32mm unique shaped case and original white enamel dial, this piece exudes unmatched classic elegance.


Rolco was a brand created by Hans Wilsdorf, the founder of Rolex, in the early 20th century as part of his strategy to expand the company’s reach and market. While Rolex focused on premium timepieces, Rolco was used for more affordable, less prestigious watches, often catering to different demographics. Some Rolco watches shared components with Rolex, including movements and cases, though they were typically of a simpler design. The brand eventually faded as Rolex solidified its reputation for luxury and phased out secondary labels.


Key Features:


• Brand: Rolco (Rolex)

• Case Size: 32mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 9ct Solid Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Fully running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Original enamel dial with bold Arabic numerals

• Bracelet: Brand new burgundy leather strap

• Era: Circa 1920s/1930s

• Caseback: Marked with Rolex insignia, 9ct hallmark, and reference number 110669



Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

Offered here is an ultra-rare Seiko Pulse Graph PROA-4A10, a Japan-only digital training watch released in the mid-1990s. Designed for professional athletic performance tracking, this model was decades ahead of its time, featuring real-time pulse monitoring, lap and split timing, rhythm beeps, and more.

This example is fully functional and is fitted with a brand new black resin strap. The original strap has deteriorated, which is common for this model, but the watch itself remains in great physical condition with only minor signs of age.

Key Details:
• Model: Seiko Pulse Graph PROA-4A10 (JDM release only)
• Module: 4A10
• Release Era: Circa 1995
• Features: Pulse sensor mode, lap timer, pitch beep training, result recall, timekeeping
• Strap: Brand new black resin strap
• Condition: Fully functional; great physical condition with light signs of wear
• Made in Japan
• Water resistant
• Battery hatch allows for easy coin-style replacement

Please Note:
Only the watch shown in the photos is included in this sale. No original accessories, sensor wire, box, or branded strap attachments are included.

A true gem for collectors of vintage Seiko, early biometric tech, or 1990s Japanese digital watches, this model rarely appears—especially in working condition.

Ships carefully.
Feel free to reach out with any questions.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Casio DB-1000 Data Bank Telememo 50 Men’s 80s Digital Watch Mod. 285 JDM
itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a vintage Casio DB-1000 Data Bank Telememo 50 digital wristwatch, first released in August 1984. T...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a vintage Casio DB-1000 Data Bank Telememo 50 digital wristwatch, first released in August 1984. This historic piece is one of Casio’s earliest Data Bank models, featuring the legendary Module 285.

This particular example is in fully working condition — all functions operate correctly, including the stopwatch, alarm, dual time, Telememo storage, and even the rare touch-sensitive panel backlight. The screen is clear and easy to read, and the watch keeps accurate time.

The original stainless steel Casio bracelet is still present and in excellent shape, with the correct B-46TN clasp and “Japan A” markings on the case back — a true testament to its Japanese manufacture and early production.

Please note: The front metal buttons have been replaced with aftermarket flat black buttons at some point in the past. This does not affect functionality but should be considered if you’re a collector seeking a fully original example.

Cosmetically, the watch shows normal wear consistent with age but remains in great condition overall. A fantastic example of Casio’s early digital innovation, perfect for collectors of vintage tech or retro timepieces.

Features:
• Module 285 (Made in Japan)
• Released August 1984
• Fully functional Telememo 50 storage
• Touch-activated panel light
• Stopwatch, Alarm, Countdown Timer, Dual Time
• Auto Calendar
• Stainless steel back and original bracelet

Don’t miss your chance to own a rare and iconic piece of digital watch history!

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Sterling Silver Art Deco Enamel Cocktail Watch With Original Box
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This beautiful antique Rolex cocktail watch is a timeless classic, ideal for watch collectors and vintage enthusiasts alike. With a distinctive design and refined craftsmanship, this piece exudes vint...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This beautiful antique Rolex cocktail watch is a timeless classic, ideal for watch collectors and vintage enthusiasts alike. With a distinctive design and refined craftsmanship, this piece exudes vintage charm and sophistication.


This particular example stands out for its unusually large 30mm case size, as most cocktail watches of the era were considerably smaller—typically around 24-26mm. The bold size combined with the exquisite enamel Roman numeral dial, featuring a striking red “XII,” adds to its visual presence and rarity.


Adding even more value and historical appeal is its original presentation box from F. Hallett, a renowned Goldsmith and Silversmith based at 28 Railway Street, Altrincham, England. F. Hallett was a respected regional jeweler during the early 20th century, known for offering high-end timepieces and jewelry, making this original packaging a meaningful piece of provenance.



Key Features:


• Brand: Rolex

• Case Size: 30mm (excluding crown) – rare large format

• Case Material: Sterling Silver (.925), hallmarked inside case back

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound – marked Rolex Swiss on movement

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Functionality: Running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Original white enamel dial with Roman numerals and ornate hands

• Crown: Original fluted crown with gilt finish

• Band: Original expandable sterling silver bracelet, marked “Sterling” and “Prov. Pat”

• Presentation Box: Original fitted F. Hallett box, lined in silk and velvet

• Era: Estimated 1920s



This Rolex represents a rare opportunity to acquire an authentic Art Deco-era piece that merges horological significance with elegant design. Its originality, uncommon size, and preserved box from a known period jeweler make it especially collectible.


Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: The watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, and due to its age, no guarantees are made regarding long-term accuracy.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Seiko Pulse Graph PROA-4A10 JDM Men’s Digital Sports Watch – Full Set
itemSummaries.shortDescription: Offered here is an ultra rare Seiko Pulse Graph PROA-4A10, a Japan-only digital training watch released in the mid-1990s. Designed for professional athletic performance tracking, this model features r...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Offered here is an ultra rare Seiko Pulse Graph PROA-4A10, a Japan-only digital training watch released in the mid-1990s. Designed for professional athletic performance tracking, this model features real-time pulse monitoring, lap/split timing, rhythm beeps, and more—decades ahead of its time.
This set is 100% functional and includes the original Seiko box, sensor wire, multiple branded strap attachments, and original accessory kit. It’s an extremely hard-to-find full set, especially in this complete condition.
Key Details:
•Model: Seiko Pulse Graph PROA-4A10 (JDM release only)
• Module: 4A10
• Release Era: Circa 1995
•Features: Pulse sensor, lap timer, pitch beep training, result recall, timekeeping
• Original box included
• Pulse sensor wire included
•Original band included (has deteriorated but is still present)
• Several original Pulse Graph hook-and-loop strap attachments included
•Additional accessories: clip, extra gaskets, end piece, and more
• All functions are working perfectly
• Battery access via coin-style hatch for easy replacement
• Water resistant
• Made in Japan
The watch itself is in great physical condition with only minor signs of age. The original band has disintegrated, which is common for this model, but replacement straps are easy to source and fit.
Collector’s Note:
Complete Pulse Graph sets like this are extremely rare, particularly outside Japan. Whether you collect vintage Seiko, early biometric tech, or 1990s JDM rarities, this is a standout piece that rarely surfaces with all its original components intact.
Ships Worldwide.
Buy with confidence from a trusted collector. Feel free to reach out with any questions!

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Rolco 9ct Gold Enamel Dial Cocktail Watch
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold cocktail watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 26mm unique oct...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold cocktail watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 26mm unique octagon shaped case and original white enamel dial, this piece exudes unmatched classic elegance.


Rolco was a brand created by Hans Wilsdorf, the founder of Rolex, in the early 20th century as part of his strategy to expand the company’s reach and market. While Rolex focused on premium timepieces, Rolco was used for more affordable, less prestigious watches, often catering to different demographics. Some Rolco watches shared components with Rolex, including movements and cases, though they were typically of a simpler design. The brand eventually faded as Rolex solidified its reputation for luxury and phased out secondary labels.


Key Features:


• Brand: Rolco (Rolex)

• Case Size: 26mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 9ct Solid Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Fully running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Original enamel dial with bold Roman Numerals and art deco style detailing around the edges

• Case Shape: Unique rounded/octagon case

• Bracelet: Black leather strap

• Era: Circa 1920s/1930s

• Caseback: Marked with Rolex insignia, 9ct hallmark, and reference number 107217



Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

itemSummaries.shortDescription: Up for sale is an iconic and elegant Cartier Vendome 78090 WatchA true collector’s item from the early era of Cartier’s Vendome series. This timepiece embodies timeless sophistication, combining class...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Up for sale is an iconic and elegant Cartier Vendome 78090 Watch


A true collector’s item from the early era of Cartier’s Vendome series. This timepiece embodies timeless sophistication, combining classic design with impeccable craftsmanship. The watch has been recently serviced and is running accurately.


A Brief History of the Cartier Vendome:


Introduced as part of Cartier’s golden era, the Vendome line set a new standard for minimalist elegance. Named after the Place Vendôme in Paris, a hub of luxury and refinement, this model boasts an unmistakable round case with clean lines. The early Vendome watches, such as this one, are particularly desirable for their Paris Mark 1 dials, unique features, and intricate craftsmanship. A rare first-series model, it features bronzed hands rather than the commonly seen blued hands, adding to its historical significance.


Key Features:

• Model: Cartier Vendome 78090

• Case Size: 33mm

• Movement: Manual wind (recently serviced, running, and holding accurate time)

• Case Material: Solid 18k gold

• Dial: Paris Mark 1 dial with desirable spidering patina

• Hands: Bronzed (first-series characteristic)

• Crystal: Sapphire

• Strap: Brand new burgundy ostrich leather band

• Buckle: 18k Cartier deployant clasp



Condition:


This vintage Cartier Vendome is in excellent working condition for its age, with a beautiful patina on the Paris Mark 1 dial. The spidering effect on the dial adds character, making it a prized piece for vintage collectors. The newly added burgundy ostrich leather strap complements the gold case perfectly, and the Cartier deployant clasp completes the look with sophistication.

itemSummaries.title: Rare Vintage German Rolex Stossicher Oyster Junior Sport WW2 Military Mens Watch
itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a remarkable piece of horological history: a genuine Oyster Watch Company (Rolex) Oyster Junior Sport from the World War II era, featuring a rare German-market “Stossicher” dial. This time...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a remarkable piece of horological history: a genuine Oyster Watch Company (Rolex) Oyster Junior Sport from the World War II era, featuring a rare German-market “Stossicher” dial. This timepiece boasts an all-original design, making it an exceptional addition for serious collectors and vintage military watch enthusiasts.


Key Features:

• Model: Oyster Junior Sport

• Movement: Original Rolex Caliber 59, 15 Rubies (shock-protected)

• Case Size: 29mm

• Crown: Appears to have been modified at some point and is no longer a screw-down, but it still functions perfectly, sits tight and flush to the case, and does not affect usability in any way

• Dial: Original dial with “STOSSICHER” (German for shock resistant) script – incredibly rare wartime variant

• Bracelet: Original stainless steel expandable stretch bracelet

• Caseback: Marked with ref. 84423 / 228CF

• Condition: The watch is running smoothly and keeping accurate time



Why This Watch Is Exceptionally Rare:


This specific example is exceptionally rare due to the “Stossicher” marking on the dial, a German word meaning shock resistant. During World War II, Rolex and its affiliated companies like the Oyster Watch Co. primarily supplied watches to Allied forces. Seeing a German-language dial variant from this era—especially with Rolex’s proprietary waterproof Oyster case—is incredibly unusual and believed to be a rare export piece to Axis-occupied territories or neutral markets like Switzerland.


The presence of “Stossicher” instead of English or French shock-resistance terms adds tremendous historical intrigue, suggesting this watch may have been targeted for sale in German-speaking regions during the wartime period. It’s a true military-era survivor, preserved with originality and character.



Condition Notes:


This watch has aged with beautiful vintage patina on the dial and hands. The original lume is intact and untouched. The movement is clean, functional, and accurate, powered by the robust Rolex Caliber 59. All parts appear correct, including the original steel Oyster case. While the crown may have been modified and no longer screws down, it sits tight and flush and does not affect performance. The original steel expansion bracelet completes the package, a rare survivor in itself.


Whether you’re a vintage Rolex collector, a military watch enthusiast, or someone who appreciates unique WWII artifacts, this Oyster Junior Sport “Stossicher” is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own a historically significant and incredibly rare Rolex-affiliated timepiece.


Feel free to reach out with any questions or to request more photos.


Please Note: This is a vintage timepiece being sold in as-is condition. While it is currently keeping accurate time, no guarantees can be made about future timekeeping or water resistance due to its age.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Rolco 9ct Gold Men’s Cushion Watch
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold cushion watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 30mm cushion sha...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This stunning antique Rolco by Rolex 9ct solid gold cushion watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 30mm cushion shaped case and original white patina dial, this piece exudes unmatched classic elegance.


Rolco was a brand created by Hans Wilsdorf, the founder of Rolex, in the early 20th century as part of his strategy to expand the company’s reach and market. While Rolex focused on premium timepieces, Rolco was used for more affordable, less prestigious watches, often catering to different demographics. Some Rolco watches shared components with Rolex, including movements and cases, though they were typically of a simpler design. The brand eventually faded as Rolex solidified its reputation for luxury and phased out secondary labels.


Key Features:


• Brand: Rolco (Rolex)

• Case Size: 30mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 9ct Solid Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Fully running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Original white patina dial with blued steel hands and golden Arabic Numerals

• Case Shape: Cushion

• Bracelet: Brand new high end Hirsch black and gold leather strap

• Era: Circa 1920s/1930s

• Caseback: Marked with Rolex insignia & 9ct hallmark



Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

For sale is a remarkable piece of horological history: a genuine Oyster Watch Company (Rolex) Oyster Essex from the World War II era. This timepiece boasts an all-original design, making it a perfect addition for collectors and vintage watch enthusiasts.


Key Features:


• Model: Oyster Essex

• Movement: Original Caliber 59

• Case Size: 29mm

• Condition: The watch is running smoothly and keeping accurate time

• Dial: Original dial with golden hands and numerals for a fancy vintage military aesthetic

• Bracelet: Extremely rare, NOS era-correct Bonklip bracelet


Condition Notes:

This watch has aged gracefully, showcasing visible signs of wear that enhance its vintage charm. While the case back has been replaced with an original Rolex case back, all other components, including the dial, hands, and case, remain original to the watch. The robust Caliber 59 movement is in excellent working order, ensuring accurate timekeeping and a reliable performance.


Whether you are a vintage Rolex collector or a lover of military timepieces, this Rolex Oyster Essex is a rare find, especially with almost all original parts intact and the unique Bonklip bracelet. Don’t miss the opportunity to own a piece of Rolex history!


Feel free to reach out with any questions or for additional photos.


Please Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Rolex Dunklings 15ct Gold Cocktail Watch
itemSummaries.shortDescription: This stunning antique Rolex 15ct solid gold cocktail watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 26mm unique shaped case...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
This stunning antique Rolex 15ct solid gold cocktail watch is a rare and timeless treasure, perfect for collectors or vintage watch enthusiasts. Featuring a beautifully crafted 26mm unique shaped case and original two tone dial, this piece exudes unmatched classic elegance.


Key Features:


• Brand: Rolex (Dunklings Collaboration, Australia)

• Case Size: 26mm (excluding crown)

• Material: 15ct Solid Gold

• Condition: Pre-owned, antique

• Movement: Mechanical, hand-wound

• Functionality: Fully running and holding accurate time

• Dial: Beige and Gold two tone with bold Arabic numerals and ornate detailing

• Case Shape: Unique rounded/octagon case

• Bracelet: Brand new high end Hirsch band

• Era: Circa 1920s/1930s

• Caseback: Marked with Rolex insignia, 15ct hallmark, and reference number 21320



About Dunklings:


Dunklings was a well-regarded jeweler in Australia during the early 20th century, known for its partnership with Rolex to offer exclusive timepieces to its clientele. These collaborations produced unique designs tailored to the local market, making them an interesting and rare part of Rolex’s early history.



Please feel free to ask any questions or request additional photos.


Note: This watch is sold as-is, in vintage condition, with no guarantees regarding future accuracy due to its age.

itemSummaries.shortDescription: For sale is a vintage Casio ACL-200 “Accelerator” digital men’s watch, featuring the highly functional module 1531.&nbsp...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is a vintage Casio ACL-200 “Accelerator” digital men’s watch, featuring the highly functional module 1531. This timepiece is a standout from Casio’s performance-oriented lineup, designed for athletes and sports enthusiasts with advanced lap memory and easy-to-use controls.

This watch is fully functional with all original components, including the factory strap, bezel, and buckle. It features a rugged design with a unique dual-tone black and gray case and integrated protective bumper. The watch is powered by Casio’s reliable module 1531 and offers a rich suite of features for timing and tracking.

Key Features:
• Model: Casio ACL-200 Accelerator
• Module: 1531
• 50 Lap Memory with recall function
• Stopwatch with split/lap time
• Countdown Timer
• Daily Alarms
• Auto Light Switch (tilt-activated backlight)
• WR100M / 10 BAR water resistance
• Electro-luminescent backlight
• Dual Time & 12/24hr Format

Condition:

This watch is in fantastic overall condition and works exactly as it should. The display is crisp and clear, and all buttons are responsive. There are no cracks, major scratches, or damage visible, and the strap remains supple and secure. Please refer to the detailed photos for the best representation of its physical condition.

Whether you’re a Casio collector, a runner, or a fan of retro digital watches, this is an excellent addition to your lineup.

itemSummaries.title: Vintage Casio BP-1B Blood Pressure Monitor Men’s Digital Watch Module 2187 JDM
itemSummaries.shortDescription: Offered here is a rare and highly collectible vintage Casio BP-1B digital blood pressure monitor wristwatch, equipped with module 2187. Released in 2001, this was one of Casio’s most advanced health-f...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Offered here is a rare and highly collectible vintage Casio BP-1B digital blood pressure monitor wristwatch, equipped with module 2187. Released in 2001, this was one of Casio’s most advanced health-focused watches, made exclusively for the Japanese domestic market (JDM).


Unlike earlier BP models like the BP-100 (1992), the BP-1B featured enhanced health monitoring and was designed to interface via infrared (IR) with a companion calibration base unit—a unique innovation that allowed the transfer of calibration data directly to the watch, ensuring highly accurate blood pressure readings. This functionality sets it apart as one of Casio’s most ambitious and forward-thinking digital watches of its era.


Key Features:

• Model: Casio BP-1B

• Module: 2187

• Year of Release: 2001

• Functionality: Fully functional; all features including the blood pressure sensor, backlight, and sound are working perfectly

• Display: Clear digital readout with day, date, and time

• Strap: Original stainless steel band with Casio-signed clasp

• Condition: Good physical condition with light signs of use; please refer to photos for the most accurate representation

• Backlight & Sound: Fully operational

• Origin: Made in Japan – JDM-only release

• Collectibility: Rare and desirable for Casio and tech watch collectors


This is a standout piece from Casio’s health-tech legacy and a conversation-starting addition to any collection.


Ships carefully.

Feel free to message me with any questions.

specifics.name: Features
specifics.value: 12-Hour Dial, Backlight, Easy to Read/Large Numerals, Timer

itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Go to infinity and beyond with this vintage Toy Story Buzz Lightyear LCD watch, a colorful and fun collectible from the golden era of Disney Pixar merchandise. This watch is brand new, factory sealed, and never opened, making it a perfect find for collectors and Toy Story fans alike.


Key Features:

• Features a 3D molded Buzz Lightyear face and chestplate over the digital LCD screen

• Brightly colored space-themed strap with rockets, stars, and “Toy Story” branding

• Vibrant design aimed at children, but a nostalgic collectible for fans of all ages

• Packaging includes original barcode label and safety notice on back

• Marked for children over 3 years of age

• Likely produced around the late 1990s, shortly after the original Toy Story release

• Marked “Operation Hello” on the back strap (likely the manufacturer or licensing brand)

• Battery-operated LCD time display (untested due to sealed condition)


Condition:

Brand new and unopened in factory-sealed packaging. The watch and blister pack are in excellent condition with no yellowing or cracks. See all photos for exact condition.


This is a true throwback to 90s pop culture and one of Pixar’s most iconic characters. A great piece for any Toy Story fan, vintage toy collector, or Buzz Lightyear enthusiast!


Ships carefully. Feel free to message me with any questions.

itemSummaries.shortDescription: Celebrate the magic of Pixar’s original Toy Story with this vintage 1995 Buzz Lightyear Quartz Digital Watch, still...
itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Celebrate the magic of Pixar’s original Toy Story with this vintage 1995 Buzz Lightyear Quartz Digital Watch, still sealed in its original packaging. Officially licensed by Disney/Pixar and manufactured by Good Stuff, this nostalgic collectible features a colorful design, glow-in-the-dark case, and a raised 3D image of Buzz Lightyear inside the dial.

Key Features:
• Quartz digital watch with time and date display
• 3D dial of Buzz Lightyear under a domed crystal
• Glow-in-the-dark green case
• Colorful space-themed strap with rockets and stars
• Original Toy Story cloud background packaging
• Two-year limited warranty info (from original manufacturer) included on the back
• Marked ©1995 Hasbro, Inc. & The Walt Disney Company
• Made in China by Good Stuff

Condition:
• Factory sealed and never opened
• LCD bleed present — the screen shows signs of display damage common in vintage digital watches (see close-up photo)
• Blister pack and backing card are in excellent condition with no cracks or yellowing

This is a fantastic collector’s item for Toy Story fans, Buzz Lightyear lovers, or anyone nostalgic for classic ’90s Disney merchandise. Even with the display flaw, it remains a standout shelf piece due to its vivid design and originality.

Ships carefully. Feel free to message me with any questions.

itemSummaries.fullDescription:
For sale is an exceptionally rare and highly collectible Vintage Cartier Ellipse Jumbo Two-Tone Manual Watch, reference 78209. This ultra-scarce model, crafted from solid 18k yellow and white gold, is one of the most difficult to find in Cartier’s vintage collection. As demand for distinctive and uncommon Cartier designs continues to rise, this watch is becoming increasingly sought after by collectors and enthusiasts worldwide.


Key Features:

• Model: Cartier Ellipse Jumbo 78209

• Movement: Manual wind (recently serviced)

• Case Size: 28mm x 32.5mm

• Case Material: Two-tone 18k yellow and white gold

• Strap: Brand new high-quality black leather strap

• Crown: Iconic Cartier blue cabochon crown

• Condition: Running smoothly and keeping accurate time



Condition Notes:


This watch has been meticulously maintained, with a fully serviced movement ensuring reliable performance. The rare 18k yellow and white gold case exhibits light wear consistent with its vintage nature, further enhancing its authenticity and appeal. The dial, adorned with Cartier’s signature Roman numerals and crisp detailing, remains in excellent condition, preserving the watch’s timeless elegance.


The Cartier Ellipse Jumbo 78209 in solid 18k two-tone gold is nearly impossible to find on the market today. With Cartier’s vintage pieces continuing to rise in popularity, acquiring one in such well-preserved condition is a rare opportunity. This watch is a must-have for serious collectors, Cartier aficionados, and anyone who appreciates unique vintage luxury timepieces.

itemSummaries.fullDescription:
Up for sale is a rare and highly collectible vintage Casio BP-1B digital blood pressure monitor wristwatch, featuring module 2187. Released in 2001 exclusively for the Japan Domestic Market (JDM), this model represents one of Casio’s most advanced health-oriented timepieces.


Building on the success of earlier models like the BP-100 (1992), the BP-1B introduced upgraded health-monitoring capabilities and a groundbreaking infrared (IR) interface that allowed it to sync with a dedicated calibration base unit. This innovative system enabled the watch to receive calibration data directly—delivering far more accurate blood pressure readings than its predecessors. This forward-thinking design makes the BP-1B one of the most ambitious and sophisticated digital watches Casio ever produced.


Key Details:

• Model: Casio BP-1B

• Module: 2187

• Year of Release: 2001

• Functionality: Fully operational — blood pressure sensor, timekeeping, sound, and backlight all work perfectly

• Display: Crisp digital readout with time, day, and date

• Strap: Aftermarket Casio-branded strap in excellent condition

• Condition: Very good overall with light signs of wear; see photos for the most accurate representation

• Backlight & Sound: Fully functional

• Origin: Made in Japan — JDM-exclusive model

• Collectibility: Highly sought-after by Casio and digital tech watch collectors


This is a standout piece from Casio’s health-tech legacy — a rare blend of function, innovation, and history, perfect for collectors and enthusiasts alike.


Ships carefully.
